attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we all know the costs are rising at a rate that will cause far too much suffering to low paid and the ealderly stop the fat cats this will only go the same way as the banks the government is already having to pay out subsudies instead of stopping the companies from extorting money from ourselves the profits will do nicely as a rebate for everyone

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:  

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/mniddrie-
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
